channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Brambles inhibiting pedestrian passage, 17th August
item.description:
There are large brambles in the hedge which need pruning out. At the moment long stems are in the way as pedestrians pass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldersmead Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forest two flat tyres blocking drop down kerb (again) corner of Vicarage Grove, 17th August
item.description:
Day 1. This is nearly every day for at least 6 months. Look at the reports
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on footpath, 17th August
item.description:
There is a deceased fox on the footpath outside of number 57 Merewood Road. It has clearly been hit by a car this morning and makes a particularly upsetting sight, as its insides are fully exposed and there is blood on the path and road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Merewood Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tress overhanging into road, 17th August
item.description:
The trees are overhanging into the road at the start they are having low down and scratching the top of cars and block your view when driving and then further down they the bushes need to be cut back as they scratch the side of your car as you drive past
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Woodchurch Close, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Large Music event poster & another promo flyposted, 17th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lanes, London

item.title: 2 lights out on Goodwins court, 17th August
item.description:
There are 2 lights out on Goodwins court (again). This alleyway is plagued by homeless people and drug users and is hideously dangerous, filthy and neglected at the best of times. Fix this immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, New Row, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fox Threat in Area – Urgent Help Needed, 17th August
item.description:
A fox has been in our area for a long time. It chases adults and children and isn’t afraid of people. My kids are too scared to play outside. Neighbours are also worried. Please act quickly to remove the fox and keep us safe.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Common, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
